title: Matt Hancock – 2021 Comments on Long Covid
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Matt Hancock, the Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, on 18 February 2021.
content:
I am acutely aware of the lasting and debilitating impact long COVID can have on people of all ages, irrespective of the extent of the initial symptoms.
